sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import './RegularStay.css'; // Export type for TypeScript module resolution export type RegularStayComponent = React.FC; const RegularStay: React.FC = () => { useEffect(() => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: 'smooth' }); }, []); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Regular Single Trip Insurance

Essential travel protection for single trips up to 60 days. Affordable coverage with comprehensive medical protection.

€5M Medical Cover
60 Days Max Duration
84 Years Max Age
Get Quote Contact Us
{/* Key Features */}

Key Features

Medical Coverage

Up to €5,000,000 emergency medical expenses worldwide

Repatriation

Emergency medical repatriation to home country

Personal Liability

€2,500,000 coverage for accidental injury to others

Trip Protection

Coverage for trip delays, cancellation, and lost baggage

{/* Coverage Details */}

Coverage Details

Medical Expenses

€5,000,000

Repatriation

Unlimited

Personal Liability

€2,500,000

Personal Effects

€2,500

Trip Cancellation

€10,000

Trip Delay

€500

{/* Eligibility */}

Eligibility Requirements

Age Limit

Up to 84 years old

Trip Duration

Maximum 60 days

Residence

EU/EEA residents only

Health

No pre-existing conditions

{/* Call to Action */}

Ready to Get Protected?

Get your instant quote and travel with confidence

Get Your Quote Now
); }; export default RegularStay;
